whyJoin.title: Why join?
points: Learn how other agencies, consultancies, and tech teams run their revenue engine from one OS.
Get early looks at new features and share feedback directly with the product team.
Swap templates, playbooks, and best practices with peers who care about lean, compliant RevOps.

contribute.title: Ways to contribute
points: Share templates and workflows that worked for you.
Participate in design partner sessions and beta tests.
Offer feedback on docs and help articles so we can improve them.
